text: haey chaur komaoy puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) reareang anak pi( kar phsaapv phsaay) ayeat robsa a l laoh cheadeachkhat kraoypel delke ban banhchouh vea aoy anak haey noh . chaur anak ampeavneav( mnoussa lok) towkean mcheasa robsa anak . haey chaur kom thveu aoy khluon anak sthet knongchamnaom puok del thveu shi ri k aoy saoh
